sources.Primary: Utility tariff books and rate schedules
sources.Verification: Utility regulatory filings with Louisiana Public Service Commission

notes: Rates are current as of January 2025. Commercial rates shown are for Large General Service (LGS) customers typically >500kW demand. Fuel adjustment clauses updated quarterly. Contact utility for site-specific rate analysis.
important_notes: Demand charges apply to maximum kW during specified periods
Fuel adjustment clause (FAC) varies quarterly based on fuel costs
Renewable energy riders may apply for net metering
Special rates may be available for microgrids with demand response
